item.title: 美国申请失业救济人数略有下降，仍接近创纪录前水平
item.description: 上周美国失业救济金申请人数变化不大，与大流行前的水平基本持平。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits were little changed last week, remaining roughly in line with pre-pandemic levels.】

item.title: 美国生产者价格指数因服务成本下降而停滞不前
item.description: 美国 2 月份的批发通胀停滞不前，这得益于服务成本的下降，并表明在特朗普政府征收额外关税之前，物价有所松动。【原文：US wholesale inflation stagnated in February, helped by a decline in services costs and pointing to some relief on prices before additional tariffs were imposed by the Trump administration.】

item.title: 共和党人敦促美联储修改补充杠杆率
item.description: 五位众议院共和党人敦促美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔采取措施改善国债市场的流动性，包括考虑 "有针对性地 "修改银行资本要求。【原文：Five House Republicans urged Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell to take steps to improve liquidity in the Treasury securities market, including considering “targeted” changes to bank capital requirements.】

item.title: 石油生产峰值的阴影再次笼罩
item.description:
在本周于休斯顿举行的 CERAWeek 会议上，该主题占据了显著位置。【原文：

The topic has featured prominently at this week’s CERAWeek conference in Houston.

item.title: 雨果博斯预计年初美国和中国市场需求低迷
item.description: 雨果博斯公司（Hugo Boss AG）今年恢复利润增长的计划面临初步障碍，因为美国和中国消费者情绪疲软，影响了本季度的销售和利润。【原文：Hugo Boss AG’s plan to return to profit growth this year faces an initial hurdle as weak consumer sentiment in the US and China weigh on sales and profit in the current quarter.】

item.title: 加拿大汽车零部件股因关税问题陷入困境
item.description: 随着北美汽车制造业陷入停滞的可能性增大，加拿大最大的汽车零部件企业在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税威胁重压下举步维艰。这使得股价急速回落，跌至科维德-19 大流行时期的水平。【原文：Canada’s biggest auto parts names are buckling under the weight of US President Donald Trump’s tariff threats as the chances the North American car manufacturing industry will stall grow. That’s sending stock prices hurtling back down toward levels last seen during the Covid-19 pandemic.】

item.title: 德意志银行将汽车业贷款列为日益增长的风险
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）警告说，欧洲充满挑战的经济环境、向电动汽车的过渡以及来自中国的竞争，正在给其汽车行业贷款带来越来越大的风险。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG warned that a challenging economic environment in Europe, the transition to electric vehicles and competition from China are posing a growing risk to its loans to the automotive sector.】

item.title: 全球企业权衡关税冲击下的额外成本和选择
item.description: 面对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普狂轰滥炸的关税大棒，全球各地的企业高管都在拼命判断自己的业务会受到怎样的影响，以及需要做些什么。【原文：In corporate suites around the world, executives are desperately trying to determine how their businesses will be affected and what they need to do in the face of President Donald Trump’s frenzied tariff barrage.】

item.title: 欧洲饲料行业因美国可能对大豆征收关税而受到干扰
item.description: 欧洲动物饲料行业警告说，如果美国大豆在布鲁塞尔和华盛顿之间不断升级的贸易战中受到冲击，供应将面临挑战。【原文：Europe’s animal feed industry has warned of supply challenges if US soybeans are hit in the escalating trade war between Brussels and Washington.】

item.title: Meta 向其用户社区求助，以消除错误信息
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）撰文介绍了 Meta 为打击其社交网络上的不实信息而推出的听起来很熟悉的新计划。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner writes about Meta’s familiar-sounding new program to fight misinformation on its social networks.】

item.title: 特朗普大跌震撼华尔街，"逢低买入 "呼声渐弱
item.description: 短短几周内，唐纳德-特朗普总统就开始压制那些在华尔街定调长达二十年之久的买跌股票交易员。【原文：In a few short weeks, President Donald Trump has started silencing the buy-the-dip stock traders who set the tone on Wall Street for the better part of two decades.】

item.title: 法国借贷成本在惠誉审查前接近 14 年高点
item.description: 在周五法国主权评级可能被下调之前，法国的长期借贷成本已接近十多年来的最高水平。【原文：France’s long-term borrowing costs are nearing the highest level in over a decade ahead of a possible downgrade of the nation’s sovereign rating on Friday.】

item.title: 瑞士保留州立街养老金，消除对特朗普的担忧
item.description: 在立法者否决了重新确立瑞士国内控制权以防范美国对该国的强力控制的提议后，道富公司将继续保管价值 460 亿法郎（约合 520 亿美元）的瑞士养老金。【原文：State Street Corp. will remain custodian of a 46 billion-franc ($52 billion) Swiss pension hoard after lawmakers rejected a bid to reassert domestic control as a guard against US strong-arming of the country.】

item.title: 土耳其寻求延长美国制裁豁免以购买俄罗斯天然气
item.description: 据土耳其知情官员称，土耳其正在寻求延长美国对其制裁的豁免期，这将允许土耳其继续购买俄罗斯天然气。【原文：Turkey is seeking to extend a US waiver from sanctions, which would allow it to continue buying Russian natural gas, according to Turkish officials with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚在价格风险和街头抗议中维持利率不变
item.description: 塞尔维亚中央银行连续第六个月维持基准利率不变，原因是物价压力持续存在，政府面临十年来最大规模的政治抗议活动。【原文：Serbia’s central bank left the benchmark interest rate unchanged for a sixth month as price pressures persist and the government confronts the biggest political protests in a decade.】

item.title: 美国通胀短期缓解，长期隐忧重重
item.description: 我是纽约的经济编辑莫莉-史密斯。今天我们将探讨美国通胀的朦胧前景。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Molly Smith, an economics editor in New York. item.title: 研究称银行共享私人信息以抢夺债务交易
item.description: 一项新的研究显示，全球银行似乎正在向顶级客户提供私人信息，以赢得公司债券交易业务。这项研究表明，这个每天交易额达 560 亿美元的市场正向拥有最广泛交易商网络的最活跃投资者倾斜。【原文：Global banks appear to be giving top clients private information to win corporate-bond trading business, according to a new study showing the $56 billion-a-day market is stacked in favor of the most active investors with the broadest dealer networks.】

item.title: 监督机构称，大型科技公司必须对色情短信诈骗负责
item.description: 全球黑钱监督机构负责人表示，世界上一些最大的社交媒体平台应 "从根本上 "对其在助长针对儿童的色情信息诈骗中所起的作用负责。【原文：Some of the world’s largest social media platforms should “fundamentally” be held responsible for their role in facilitating sextortion scams that target children, according to the head of a global dirty-money watchdog.】

item.title: 梅林克罗特制药公司与恩度公司达成 67 亿美元合并协议
item.description: Mallinckrodt 制药公司和 Endo 公司计划合并，成立一家价值 67 亿美元的公司，此举将降低成本，扩大患者和新疗法的使用范围。【原文：Mallinckrodt Pharmaceuticals and Endo Inc. plan to merge and create a $6.7 billion company in a move that will cut costs and broaden access to patients and new treatments.】

item.title: 德国中型企业将从 Merz 的一揽子投资计划中获益匪浅
item.description: 德国计划进行的财政改革将有利于该国更多面向国内的中型工业股票。【原文：Germany’s planned fiscal reform would be a boon for the country’s more domestically-oriented industrial mid-cap stocks.】

item.title: 交易员已开始押注俄罗斯债券即将回归
item.description: 市场数据截至美国东部时间上午 06:33。根据供应商协议，市场数据可能会有所延迟。【原文：Market data as of 06:33 am EST. Market data may be delayed depending on provider agreements.】

item.title: 欧洲养老基金准备取消对国防股的长期禁令
item.description: 欧洲几家养老基金正在审查长期以来对武器制造商的排斥政策，同时努力更新其投资组合，以适应当前的政治形势。【原文：Several pension funds in Europe are reviewing long-standing exclusion policies on weapons manufacturers, as they work to update their portfolios to match the political moment.】

item.title: 苹果股价失去避风港魅力，逆风阻挡多头
item.description: 多年来，投资者一直将苹果公司视为市场动荡时期的潜在安全港。这一次，这种说法没有得到证实。【原文：For years, investors have talked of Apple Inc. as a potential port of safety in times of market turmoil. That hasn’t been borne out this time around.】

item.title: 贝莱德、投资者向陷入困境的聚合器 Razor 注入资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，包括贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Investors including BlackRock Inc. have agreed to provide another loan of at least $15 million to Razor Group, according to people familiar with the matter, as the German e-commerce brand aggregator attempts to stave off a liquidity crunch.】

item.title: 财大气粗的美团希望在香港的胜利基础上再接再厉
item.description: 香港居民西蒙-苗（Simon Miao）在疫情期间订阅了 Deliveroo 的食品配送服务，但后来他取消了订阅，因为最高 98 港元（约合 12.61 美元）的月费并没有带来多少好处。【原文：Simon Miao, a Hong Kong resident, signed up for a food-delivery subscription with Deliveroo during the pandemic, but he later canceled it because the monthly fee, which tops out at HK$98 ($12.61), didn’t bring many perks.】

item.title: CIBC 任命哈里-库勒姆（Harry Culham）为下一任首席执行官。
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）任命哈里-库勒姆（Harry Culham）接替首席执行官维克多-多迪格（Victor Dodig）。【原文：Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce appointed Harry Culham to succeed Chief Executive Officer Victor Dodig, who will retire in November after leading the nation’s fifth-largest lender for more than a decade.】

item.title: OpenAI 请求白宫免除各州人工智能规则的限制
item.description: OpenAI 要求特朗普政府帮助人工智能公司免受越来越多的州政府法规的限制，如果这些公司自愿与联邦政府分享其模型的话。【原文：OpenAI has asked the Trump administration to help shield artificial intelligence companies from a growing number of proposed state regulations if they voluntarily share their models with the federal government.】

item.title: 北欧联合银行不再认为挪威会在今年或明年降息
item.description: 北欧联合银行（Nordea Bank Abp）分析师表示，由于通胀率高于预期和登记失业率下降，挪威央行明年可能不会降息。【原文：Norway’s central bank will probably refrain from interest rate cuts through next year due to faster-than-expected inflation and a decline in registered unemployment, according to analysts at Nordea Bank Abp.】

item.title: 滞胀交易成为美国股市下跌中的罕见赢家
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发动的关税战已持续第三周，引发了股市溃败，在这种情况下，几乎没有什么制胜的策略可供选择。不过，现在有一种策略正在飙升：在经济陷入滞胀的情况下，押注于股票的配对交易。【原文：There have been few winning strategies to seek refuge in as the stock rout sparked by President Donald Trump’s start-stop tariff war drags on for a third week. One, though, is soaring right now: a pair trade that bets on stocks that thrives in an economy sinking into stagflation.】

item.title: 沙特阿美四月份对华石油销售量将大幅下降
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）将向中国供应至少 10 个月来最低数量的石油，甚至可能更久。【原文：Saudi Aramco is set to supply the lowest amount of oil to China in at least 10 months, and possibly much longer.】
